scripts.build: npm run build:main && npm run build:preload && npm run build:renderer
scripts.compile: cross-env MODE=production npm run build && electron-builder build --config .electron-builder.config.js --dir --config.asar=false
scripts.build:mac: cross-env MODE=production npm run build && electron-builder build --config .electron-builder.config.js --mac
scripts.build:win: cross-env MODE=production npm run build && electron-builder build --config .electron-builder.config.js --win
scripts.build:all: cross-env MODE=production npm run build && electron-builder build --config .electron-builder.config.js --mac --win
scripts.typecheck: npm run typecheck:main && npm run typecheck:preload && npm run typecheck:renderer
